sentences.sContent: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.sContent_eng: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.sCn: 探险者们谨慎地把独木舟向上游划去。

sentences.sContent: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.sContent_eng: At a summer job working as park naturalists that year, I flipped the canoe Air and I were paddling and we had to push it to shore.
sentences.sCn: 那年我在公园里做暑期兼职，我把独木舟翻转个身，然后我们一起合力将它推到岸边，这样我们就可以划船了。

sentences.sContent: I remember the first time I visited a village in Vietnam, in 1995: we endured hours and hours of rutty roads or long hours in a canoe to reach project sites.
sentences.sContent_eng: I remember the first time I visited a village in Vietnam, in 1995: we endured hours and hours of rutty roads or long hours in a canoe to reach project sites.
sentences.sCn: 我记得1995年第一次访问越南一个村落，我们捱过很多小时的路途颠簸、坐了很多小时的独木舟，才到达项目的所在地。

trans.tranOther: a long light boat that is pointed at both ends and which you move along using a  paddle
